i.name: Noxious Slipstream
i.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

q.name: Poison Trail
q.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.

w.name: Mega Adhesive
w.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.

e.name: Fling
e.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.

r.name: Insanity Potion
r.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.

i1.blurb: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Moving near a {{tip|champion}} grants '''Singed''' {{sti|ms|{{as|20% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} for 2 seconds. The effects of ''Noxious Slipstream'' can stack up to 25 times.
i1.name: Noxious Slipstream

riot.name: Noxious Slipstream
riot.description: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

riot.name: Poison Trail
riot.description: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
riot.tooltip: <spellPassive>Toggle: </spellPassive>Singed lays a poisonous trail that deals {{ e1 }} <scaleAP>(+{{ charabilitypower*4 }})</scaleAP> magic damage per second.

q1.blurb: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
description: {{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Singed''' leaves a {{tip|poison}} cloud behind him for {{fd|3.25}} seconds.

Enemies standing in the cloud's trail are {{tip|poison|poisoned}} for 2 seconds, taking {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds for the duration, continually refreshing while remaining in the affected area.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage per {{fd|0.25}} Seconds|{{ap|5 to 15}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|5*8 to 15*8}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Poison Trail
notes: * Toggling ''Poison Trail'' on/off does not trigger {{nie|Spellblade}} or charge {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.

riot.name: Mega Adhesive
riot.description: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
riot.tooltip:
Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for {{ e2 }} seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by {{ e1 }}% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.

If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.

w1.blurb: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' covers the target area with a potent adhesive for 3 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} by 40% and {{tip|ground|grounding}} all enemies within.
w1.name: Mega Adhesive

riot.name: Fling
riot.description: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
riot.tooltip:
Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) plus {{ e3 }}% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.

If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for {{ e2 }} second(s).

e1.blurb: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' {{tip|airborne|flings}} the target enemy over his shoulder 550 units, dealing {{as|magic damage}}, capped against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}}.
Targets flung into {{ais|Mega Adhesive|Singed}} area of effect are temporarily {{tip|root|rooted}}.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|50 to 110}} {{as|(+ {{ap|6 to 8}}% of target's '''maximum''' health)}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}|Maximum Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|350 to 410}} {{as|(+ 75% AP)}}}}
e1.name: Fling
notes: * ''Fling's'' target is disabled for {{tt|1 second|Estimated}} while being displaced.
** Enemies using {{si|Flash}} during ''Fling's'' cast time will still be entirely affected (damage, disabling, displacement).
* ''Fling'' can make enemies go over walls (circumstances permitting).
* ''Fling'' will always attempt to displace enemies so they land behind ''Singed''.
** Enemies may sometimes be displaced sideways if ''Singed'' approached them diagonally (caused by him not facing in their direction when casting ''Fling'').
* Possible bug: Slow-immune enemies will not be {{tip|root|rooted}} when flung into {{ai|Mega Adhesive|Singed}}.

riot.name: Insanity Potion
riot.description: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
riot.tooltip: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him {{ e1 }} Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for {{ e2 }} seconds.

r1.blurb: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Singed''' drinks a potent chemical brew, gaining {{sti|ap|{{as|'''bonus''' ability power}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|'''bonus''' armor}}}}, {{sti|mr|{{as|'''bonus''' magic resistance}}}}, {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' health regeneration}}}}, and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' mana regeneration}}}}, all for the next 25 seconds.
leveling:
{{st|Bonus Stats|{{ap|30 to 80 3}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Regeneration per Second|{{ap|6 to 16 3}}|Total Regeneration|{{ap|6*25 to 16*25 3}}}}
r1.name: Insanity Potion
notes: * ''Insanity Potion'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Singed's'' previous orders.
